name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.retry.max.attempts
description:
Max retry to satisfy the block storage policy. After this retry block will be removed
    from the movement needed queue.

name: dfs.client-write-packet-size
description: Packet size for clients to write

name: dfs.datanode.fsdatasetcache.max.threads.per.volume
description:
The maximum number of threads per volume to use for caching new data
    on the datanode. These threads consume both I/O and CPU. This can affect
    normal datanode operations.

name: dfs.datanode.lazywriter.interval.sec
description: Interval in seconds for Datanodes for lazy persist writes.

name: mapreduce.job.local-fs.single-disk-limit.check.interval-ms
description: Interval of disk limit check to run in ms.

name: mapreduce.task.timeout
description:
The number of milliseconds before a task will be
  terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor
  updates its status string.  A value of 0 disables the timeout.
